cards.title: Adhesive Antibody
body: Play this card next to the non-Antibody non-[b]tagged[/b] target with the third lowest HP. That target is [b]tagged[/b]. Increase damage dealt to that target by Immune cards by 1. At the start of that target's turn, this card deals it 1 toxic damage.

When this card would leave play, instead it and the target it's next to each regain 5 HP, then move it next to the non-Antibody non-[b]tagged[/b] target with the third lowest HP and it becomes indestructible until the end of the turn.

cards.title: Allergic Reaction
body: After a target deals 4 or more damage at once, that damage type becomes [b]monitored[/b] and all other damage types are no longer [b]monitored.[/b]
Whenever a target deals damage of a [b]monitored[/b] type, move the Antibody with the highest HP next to that target.
At the start of the environment turn, if any target has 2 or more Antibodies next to it, destroy this card.

cards.title: Corrosive Chamber
body: At the end of the environment turn, deal each target 2 toxic damage.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy each target with 2 or fewer HP. If no targets were destroyed this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Hostile Response
body: At the end of the environment turn, search the environment deck and trash for an Antibody card and put it into play. Then, shuffle the environment deck.
At the start of the environment turn, reveal the top card of the environment deck. If it's an Immune card, replace it and destroy this card. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.title: Nerve Cluster
body: At the end of each turn, this card deals {H} melee damage to each target that dealt {H + 2} or more damage to targets other than itself this turn.
At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard up to 3 cards. If {H + 2} or more cards are discarded this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Nutrient Flow
body: At the end of the environment turn, each target regains 2 HP.
At the start of the environment turn, each target regains 1 HP. Then, destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the environment deck.

cards.title: Peristaltic Passage
body: When this card enters play, destroy 1 hero Ongoing card and 1 villain Ongoing card.
Targets can't deal damage to other targets.
At the start of the environment turn, each player draws a card. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Repel Invaders
body: When this card enters play, deal each non-Antibody target 1 toxic damage, 1 melee damage, and 0 energy damage.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Under Attack
body: When this card enters play, search the environment deck and trash for an Antibody card and put it into play. Then, shuffle the environment deck.

At the end of the environment turn, move the Antibody with the highest HP next to the non-[b]tagged[/b] villain target with the highest HP. Then, deal each [b]tagged[/b] target and each Antibody 1 energy damage and destroy this card.

cards.title: Virulent Strain
body: Increase damage dealt to and by Pathogens by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-Pathogen target with the lowest HP 2 toxic damage.
Whenever damage dealt by this card reduces a target to 0 or fewer HP, this card regains {H - 1} HP and deals the {H - 1} non-Pathogen targets with the highest HP 1 toxic damage each.
